Description_lang: Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by $s1% and its duration is increased by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by 10% and its duration is increased by 50%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aura de inmolación aumenta un 10% tu velocidad de movimiento y su duración aumenta un 50%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aura de Imolação aumenta em 10% sua velocidade de movimento e a duração em 50%.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Feuerbrandaura' erhöht Eure Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit um 10% und die Dauer ist um 50% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by 10% and its duration is increased by 50%.
description_blz.es_ES: Aura de inmolación aumenta tu velocidad de movimiento un 10% y su duración aumenta un 50%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Aura d’immolation augmente votre vitesse de déplacement de 10% et sa durée est augmentée de 50%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la durata di Rogo Rovente del 50%. Inoltre, Rogo Rovente aumenta la velocità di movimento del 10%.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Обжигающий жар" повышает скорость передвижения на 10% и действует на 50% дольше.
description_blz.ko_KR: 제물의 오라 사용 시 자신의 이동 속도가 10%만큼 증가하며, 지속 시간이 50%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 獻祭光環會使你的移動速度提高10%，同時其持續時間延長50%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 献祭光环使你的移动速度提高10%，并且其持续时间延长50%。
